HonorsAwards
The Leadership Award
Raymond and Editha Edwards
ScholarshipAnna Gasparyan
Berkeley Alumna  Marketing  Communications  Social Media
Glendale California United States
Summary
UC Berkeley alumna allthings digital social media management
communications 
As a creative with a head halfway in the clouds but feet deeply
rooted to the ground I recognize beauty in everything and have
experience using digital and traditional channels to broadcast feeling
and reality to thousands of eyeballs
Experience
Armenian National Committee of America  Western Region
Media and Communications Coordinator
January 2023  August 2023  8 months
Los Angeles California United States
Managed all aspects of media relations for the organization from developing
marketing campaigns cultivating key relationships with media personnel to
writing news releases and advisories disseminated to thousands of media
publications across the country  
Created rich and creative written copy and visual graphics optimized for search
engines social media and print brochures flyers banners and stepand
repeats for the largest Armenian American grassroots organization in the
western United States  
Successfully promoted dozens of soldout community events fundraisers and
luncheons through publication ads mass newsletters organically on social
media and leveraging strategically boosted posts on Facebook and Instagram
to nearly 50000 followers across platforms  
Supervised and directed a team of three media and communications interns
who created new social media accounts technical guides and engaging video
content for the organization in their first month alone 
  Page 1 of 4    
Executed holistic marketing strategy to involve and effectively engage the
youth with the organization’s mission and activities while simultaneously
promoting the internship program which received a record number of
applicants since its conception
AMGtime
Marketing Assistant
March 2022  January 2023  11 months
Glendale California United States
 Conducted competitive research to gain insight into payroll software
landscape and created master sheet to aid in gotomarket strategy 
 Produced effective marketing collateral which included pitch decks press
releases email display video social media posts and blogs
Thornbird Marketing
Marketing Intern
April 2022  November 2022  8 months
Remote
 Wrote press releases blogs articles and newsletters for various clients of
different industries including health tech and nonprofit 
 Created social media content in the form of static posts stories flyers
videos animated shorts for clients with varying needs and specific guidelines
Paneros Clothing
Social Media Marketing Intern
July 2021  November 2021  5 months
Remote
 Used platforms such as Canva InShot and Adobe Photoshop to create
effective Instagram and Facebook posts and stories campaign launch videos
and video and static ads 
 Assisted during campaign photoshoots by capturing behind the scenes
photography and videography and transformed raw footage into visually
appealing branding tools 
  Worked closely with managers to determine social media strategy ad
demographic and target audience to create an effective ad campaign with
limited budget
Bravo Learning Center
Tutor
September 2020  July 2021  11 months
Glendale California United States
  Page 2 of 4

grades into passing ones by using learning and focusing strategies and
communicating outside of tutoring hours to gauge progress 
Created weekly staff schedules while maintaining county health guidelines in
order to harbor a safe and clean office space for students during the Covid19
crisis

Contact
www.linkedin.com/in/
annagasparyan17  (LinkedIn)
Top Skills
Leadership
Creativity Skills
Promotional Marketing
Languages
Armenian  (Native or Bilingual)
Spanish  (Full Professional)
Honors-Awards
The Leadership Award
Raymond and Editha Edwards
ScholarshipAnna Gasparyan
Berkeley Alumna │ Marketing • Communications • Social Media
Glendale, California, United States
Summary
UC Berkeley alumna, all-things digital, social media management,
communications. 
As a creative with a head halfway in the clouds, but feet deeply
rooted to the ground I recognize beauty in everything and have
experience using digital and traditional channels to broadcast feeling
and reality to thousands of eyeballs.
Experience
Armenian National Committee of America - Western Region
Media and Communications Coordinator
January 2023 - August 2023  (8 months)
Los Angeles, California, United States
Managed all aspects of media relations for the organization, from developing
marketing campaigns, cultivating key relationships with media personnel, to
writing news releases and advisories disseminated to thousands of media
publications across the country.  
Created rich and creative written copy and visual graphics optimized for search
engines, social media, and print brochures, flyers, banners, and step-and-
repeats for the largest Armenian American grassroots organization in the
western United States.  
Successfully promoted dozens of sold-out community events, fundraisers, and
luncheons through publication ads, mass newsletters, organically on social
media, and leveraging strategically boosted posts on Facebook and Instagram
to nearly 50,000 followers across platforms.  
Supervised and directed a team of three media and communications interns
who created new social media accounts, technical guides, and engaging video
content for the organization in their first month alone. 
  Page 1 of 4    
Executed holistic marketing strategy to involve and effectively engage the
youth with the organization’s mission and activities while simultaneously
promoting the internship program which received a record number of
applicants since its conception.
AMGtime
Marketing Assistant
March 2022 - January 2023  (11 months)
Glendale, California, United States
• Conducted competitive research to gain insight into payroll software
landscape and created master sheet to aid in go-to-market strategy. 
• Produced effective marketing collateral, which included pitch decks, press
releases, email, display, video, social media posts, and blogs.
Thornbird Marketing
Marketing Intern
April 2022 - November 2022  (8 months)
Remote
• Wrote press releases, blogs, articles, and newsletters for various clients of
different industries, including health, tech, and non-profit. 
• Created social media content in the form of static posts, stories, flyers,
videos, animated shorts for clients with varying needs and specific guidelines.
Paneros Clothing
Social Media Marketing Intern
July 2021 - November 2021  (5 months)
Remote
• Used platforms such as Canva, InShot, and Adobe Photoshop to create
effective Instagram and Facebook posts and stories, campaign launch videos,
and video and static ads. 
• Assisted during campaign photoshoots by capturing behind the scenes
photography and videography and transformed raw footage into visually
appealing branding tools. 
•  Worked closely with managers to determine social media strategy, ad
demographic, and target audience to create an effective ad campaign with
limited budget.
Bravo Learning Center
Tutor
September 2020 - July 2021  (11 months)
Glendale, California, United States
  Page 2 of 4    
Aided three high school and two middle school students to raising failing
grades into passing ones by using learning and focusing strategies and
communicating outside of tutoring hours to gauge progress. 
Created weekly staff schedules while maintaining county health guidelines in
order to harbor a safe and clean office space for students during the Covid-19
crisis. 
Environmental Design Library 
Circulation Assistant
August 2019 - March 2020  (8 months)
Berkeley, California, United States
Handled check-in and check-out process of library books and materials at
circulation desk. Communicated with staff, managers, and external librarians to
report collected library traffic data.
The Committee for Armenian Students in Public Schools
Tutor
November 2018 - June 2019  (8 months)
Glendale, California, United States
Observed and monitored students' behavior and relationship with school
subjects to motivate and encourage academic growth. Tracking learning
progress in order to identify opportunities to enhance tutoring methods and
show growth. Initiated five-minute games at beginning of sessions to inspire
and excite students to learn and excel.
Dr. Manvel Mazmanyan, MD.
Medical Receptionist
February 2018 - November 2018  (10 months)
Glendale, California, United States
Documented patient medical information, case histories and insurance details
to facilitate smooth appointments and payment processing. Suggested and
implemented the switch from twenty-year-old physical files to a digital patient
record system.
Starbucks
Barista
November 2017 - February 2018  (4 months)
Glendale, California, United States
Pleasantly interacting with customers during hectic periods to promote fun,
positive environment. Preparing coffee and specialty drinks, cleaning dining
  Page 3 of 4    
areas, opening register and carrying out other opening and closing duties for
the highest grossing Starbucks location at the time. 
GLENDALE DIAGNOSTIC IMAGING NETWORK, INC.
Medical Records Clerk
June 2016 - November 2017  (1 year 6 months)
Glendale, California, United States
Acted as a liaison between litigation, copy services, and the radiology facility
to manage and create hard-copy medical documentation. Optimized old
organizational systems for payment collections, AP/AR, deposits and record-
keeping, and created instructional video and literature for future employees.
Strictly followed and implemented HIPAA law in order to protect sensitive
patient information. 
Education
University of California, Berkeley
Bachelor of Science - BS, Business Administration  · (2019 - 2021)
Glendale Community College
Associate of Science (AS-T) , Business Administration  · (2017 - 2019)
